transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar sir, login kar raha hu apna number dal ke 8960719199 OTP nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: OTP nahi aa raha hai sir. Ye kaunsi company hai sir?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Company kaunsi hai aapka?
Customer: Hello
Customer: Mera mera number
Executive: Nahi sir aapka company ka naam kya hai?
Customer: Sai Export India.
Executive: Sai Export India.
Customer: Ji S A I Sai Export India.
Executive: Ji sir.

Executive: Aap kaise mobile se kar rahe hai ya system se kar rahe hai sir kaise kar rahe hai?
Customer: Mai laptop se kar raha hu sir.
Executive: Laptop se kar rahe hai kya? haan
Executive: Laptop pe sir Google pe type kijiyega sir seller.indiamart.com
Customer: Ji?
Executive: seller.indiamart.com
Customer: Google pe Google pe
Executive: seller.indiamart.com
Executive: Sir mai aapko sir mai aapko call back kar raha hu just call back kar raha hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving OTP for login.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the customer to login through laptop.

- Executive said he will call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login, otp, seller.indiamart.com
